name: Santa's busy day
description:
"Santa's Busy Day" is an atmospheric little arcade game. You control Santa's sleigh and fly over roofs, trees, churches, and more. The goal is to drop presents at the right time, so they fall into the right place.

There are two modes in this game:




Compete with players around the world. Who can drop the most presents without crashing into a building? This mode will get progressively harder and faster.




For everyone who wants to enjoy the peace and atmosphere of Christmas. It's specifically designed to be relaxing. There's no score, and it doesn't get faster – just for you to enjoy.

If you're not yet in a Christmas mood, maybe you will be because of this game. That's our goal.
